content: fremont street 2-color mat kladney - 2019 @that hat over there gauge supplies needed skills needed 4 x4 stockinette color a worsted weight yarn 100y knitting in the round 22 5 row x 15 stitches color b worsted weight yarn 100y knit/purl/slip_stitch us 5-9 3 5-5 5mm cdd center double decrease cdd instructions slip 2 stitches as if to work k2tog k1 pass both slipped stitches over the knit stitch ​ knitting notes this hat uses mosaic knitting to create the pattern if you haven t used mosaic knitting before it is the easiest way to add colorwork into a pattern - perfect for beginners who have gotten knit and purl down and want to add something a little more complex mosaic knitting is easy because it only uses one color at a time so you don t have to juggle two working yarns at the same time each row will be knit twice in the same color for the pattern below you will knit row 1 and 2 with color a black in the pattern row 3/4 with color b white in the pattern row 5/6 with color b and so on when you work across a row in mosaic knitting you will only knit the color of that row any other stitch will be a slip_stitch with the yarn in the back this slip_stitch will bring up the color of the row below generating the pattern you will complete each row in the chart twice hence the labeling 1/2 3/4 consider the chart below row 1-4 in this pattern row 1 and 2 will be completed as follows with color a k2 sl1 x8 after completing these row you will switch to color b and work on row 3 and 4 as follows sl1 k2 x3 sl1 k3 sl1 k2 x3 sl1 k1 it is very important to make sure your gauge is not too tight on the slip stitches too loose is way ​ better than too tight fremont street 2-color mat kladney -
